excerpt: "Researchers have found a way to turn simple line drawings into photo-realistic facial images. Developed by a team at the Chinese Academy of Sciences in Beijing, DeepFaceDrawing uses artificial intelligence to help â€œusers with little training in drawing to produce high-quality images from rough or even incomplete freehand sketches."
